mdRecord.dcterms:description: For voice and piano or organ
Imprint date inferred from advertisement on title page: "See the Stieff piano at World's Exposition, Chicago, 1893."
Title page illustration: Cartouche with woman playing a Stieff piano and a bottle of Bromo-Seltzer / B.G. Malone, Balto.
Advertisement on p. 3: "Bromo-Seltzer cures all headaches; trial size, 10 cts."
